title: Cambridge Analytica: Warrant sought to inspect company
text: The London-based company is accused of using the personal data of 50 million Facebook members to influence the US presidential election in 2016

title: French police hold ex-president Sarkozy over campaign funding
text: Police are investigating alleged irregularities over the financing of his 2007 presidential campaign

title: US and South Korea set date for postponed Foal Eagle military drills
text: The drills are a major point of contention on the Korean peninsula, as North Korea sees them as preparation for invasion

title: Rhino dies: Sudan was the last male northern white
text: Sudan, 45, lived at the Ol Pejeta Conservancy in Kenya. He was put to sleep on Monday after age-related complications worsened significantly

title: Trump urges death penalty for drug dealers
text: He outlined the proposal during a speech in New Hampshire, a state badly affected by the opioid crisis

title: Mysterious aurora Steve seen from Scotland
text: More properly described as a Strong Thermal Emission Velocity Enhancement, it was seen during displays of the Aurora Borealis overnight.
